name: GeForce NOW
content:
files:
- gfn: http://download.nvidia.com/gfnpc/GeForceNOW-release.exe
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Users/user/AppData/Local/NVIDIA Corporation/GeForceNOW/CEF/GeForceNOW.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    executable: gfn
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: corefonts msxml3
    arch: win64
    description: Installing needed libraries
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: compiler
    PROTON_FSHACK_INTEGER_SCALING: '1'
    STAGING_SHARED_MEMORY: '1'
    WINEFSYNC: '1'
    WINE_LARGE_ADDRESS_AWARE: '1'
  restore_gamma: true
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
